R

removeBombs(Group) - Method in class operations.BoundsClamp
any bomb that has hit the ground is removed from the observable list uses a clamp to test bombs
rotateBox(Node) - Method in class operations.RotateElements
this method makes a single 3D box turn 180 degrees just call the method and supply the individual box and it will be rotated 180 degrees once
rotateCam(PerspectiveCamera) - Static method in class operations.CreateCamera
 
RotateElements - Class in operations
this method is used to rotate 3D objects
RotateElements() - Constructor for class operations.RotateElements
 
rotateTank(Node, int, int) - Method in class operations.RotateElements
DO NOT ALTER see glen if you want different behavior for your player this makes the player tank face the direction of the arrow key press it uses a facing and move to face variable in amin to calculate which way to move if you require different movement for your player see glen for help
